content.name: UT CaC Legacy
content.description: All discontinued Script Files of UT CaC (or files restoring compatiblity) are moved here after a few Versions to keep the Modules clean - try using this Mod when attempting to load older Saves with new Versions of this Script
content.author: UniTrader

text.name: UT CaC Legacy
text.description: All discontinued Script Files of UT CaC (or files restoring compatiblity) are moved here after a few Versions to keep the Modules clean - try using this Mod when attempting to load older Saves with new Versions of this Script
text.author: UniTrader

text.name: UT CaC Legacy
text.description: Alle veralteten Scriptdateien (oder Dateien, die Kompatibilität herstellen) werden nach ein paar Versionen hierher verschoben um die Module sauber zu halten - verwende diese Mod, wenn du versuchst alte Spielstände mit der neuesten Version zu laden.
text.author: UniTrader
